1: Don't know which one it was
2: But tell my something- Which would surprise you more?
3: My face in the news with my brains blasted out
4: Or my songs playing daily on the radio every single time you tried to tune me out
5: I hope you pray for me
6: And if I do make it big, please don't go paging me
7: I'll always know you from afar, a distant memory
title: Lost
